name: Maya Plug-in
summary: Learn about .MLL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Autodesk Maya is a 3D software program featuring 3D animation, modeling, rendering, and simulation. It is often used to create effects for video games, movies, TV shows.

description: An MLL file is a plug-in referenced and executed by Autodesk Maya, a 3D animation program. It contains a set of procedures run by the program. MLL files function very similarly to .DLL files.
